title: Computer freezes every time I try to log into EUWest?
body: I can log into Oceania fine. About 10 seconds after I push log in on Eu West, my computer freezes and all i can do is restart by holding the power button on my laptop. I've uninstalled the game and repaired a couple of times. Nothing seems to be working. Please help?

replies.body: Thanks for replying but I think my laptop was just having a lot of errors going on. I decided to wipe everything and restore to factory settings. Everything should be fixed. thanks though!

You reply by clicking the word 'Reply' underneath someone's message, otherwise they won't get notified of your response.

Did factory resetting fix it? If the problem was caused by either a connection issue or a fault in the OS in general, then a reset wouldn't fix it.
I would suggest it is a network latency error causing some thing to hang, make sure IE is fully up to date and security settings are normal.

So I completely removed every trace of league from my computer including the registry. Still no luck.. As soon as I log in on EUW it will load the grid for the content and then bang everything freezes. Grr. Help please riot :l
